awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: The story of the Russian-born, Wisconsin-raised woman who rose to become Israel's prime minister in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
plot: The story of the Russian-born, Wisconsin-raised woman who rose to become Israel's prime minister in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
title: A Woman Called Golda
